items.title: Visa's Recent Surge Hasn't Changed My Mind
items.description: Visa is a solid company with strong operational performance; its aggressive share buyback program has proven value accretive. See why I'm keeping V rated a hold.

items.title: Why 2024 Was Great for Stocksâ€”and Why 2025 Could Be Even Better
items.author: Marketbeat.Com
items.description: The stock market had a strong performance in 2024, with the S&P 500 Index up approximately 23%. Analysts are forecasting an even better year in 2025, driven by factors like earnings growth, tax cuts, and potential regulatory changes.
